file_edits.reasoning: Modernizing Optional type annotations to use Python 3.10+ union syntax (X | None) as required by UP045 rule

edits.content:
PYDANTIC_MODEL = "pydantic_model"  # For fields with Pydantic models


@dataclass
class FieldDefinition:
    field_path: str  # e.g., "firm_information.firm_name"
    field_type: FieldType
    pydantic_model: Type[BaseModel] | None = None  # Reference to Pydantic model if applicable
    required: bool = False
    max_length: int | None = None
    min_length: int | None = None
    array_item_type: FieldType | None = None
    nested_schema: Dict[str, 'FieldDefinition'] | None = None
    needs_llm: bool = False  # Whether this field needs LLM processing
    merge_strategy: Literal["prefer_website", "prefer_external", "merge", "concat", "deduplicate"] = "merge"
edits.description: Modernizing Optional type annotations to use Python 3.10+ union syntax (X | None) as required by UP045 rule
